title: Sr. Manager, Operations, Studio Management - Albuquerque
overview: The Sr. Manager, Operations, Studio Management - Albuquerque position is responsible for managing studio operations, providing leadership and support to the studio management team, developing strategies for a best-in-class studio experience, cultivating relationships with productions and vendors, managing budgets, overseeing facilities services, collaborating on community relations initiatives, and delivering an exceptional experience for productions.
description:
Sr. Operations Manager, Studio Management
Location: Albuquerque, NM
Studio Management and Services

We are seeking a Sr. Operations Manager to join our growing Studio Management and Services team.¬† This position will be housed in Albuquerque.¬† This position reports to the Director, Studio Management and Services UCAN.

The Opportunity
Netflix is one of the world's leading entertainment services with over 238 million paid memberships in over 190 countries enjoying TV series, films, and games across a wide variety of genres and languages. Members can play, pause, and resume watching as much as they want, anytime, anywhere, and can change their plan at any time. 

The Role
A successful candidate will be a resident expert in their field with an emphasis on leadership, strategy and providing customer service excellence.¬† A candidate will be passionate, self-motivated, proactive, a strategic thinker, flexible, able to pivot when necessary. The ability to juggle multiple, diverse responsibilities with a strong emphasis on organization and an unwavering attention to detail at all times is required. This is a demanding and fast-moving position that requires someone who is a strong people manager, and is able to exercise good judgment and communication.¬†

extras.title: Responsibilities
content: Responsible for managing studio operations at Albuquerque Studios
Provide direct leadership, vision and support to the studio management team
Lead and develop strategies for best in class studio experience
Cultivate and nurture relationships with productions, vendors, local crew base, local agencies, as well as internal Netflix stakeholders
Collaborate with Internal Netflix, NM Film Office and local businesses in support of Production
Experienced in forecasting and managing OPEX and CAPEX budgets
Oversight of the CAPEX Project Coordination and Management
Build and nurture relationships with internal stakeholders and vendors
Oversight of facilities services team service (MEP management, vendor RFPs, negotiations and contracts)
Collaborate on community relations initiatives
Responsible for delivering an exceptional experience for our productions
Create and implement workflows that are efficient and effective
Prepare/deliver studio presentations as needed
Conduct business essential tours
Accustomed to working in a fast paced environment, able to multitask, and meet tight deadlines
Perform other duties as required

extras.title: Qualifications
content: 10+ years experience in entertainment-specific operational and facilities management
Candidates will likely be in a Director+ role level outside of Netflix.
A strategic leader that is able to communicate a clear vision
Experienced in leading and building an effective operations team
Production experience / knowledge required
Strong budgeting and forecasting skills (OPEX/CAPEX)
Experience in studio program and delivery a plus
Proven track record of managing and scaling a team to keep up with studio activities
Ability to understand and digest complex concepts and projects
Knowledge of film incentives a plus
Knowledge of architecture, engineering, TI/construction renovation a plus
Strong knowledge of sustainable operations
Experienced in contract negotiations and execution
Strong understands of EHS regulations and local compliance
Ability to multitask in a fast-paced environment
Access to high quality vendors a plus
Team player who operates in a fast paced team-oriented setting
Ability to be discrete and maintain confidential information
Understanding of how to prioritize and respond accordingly
Experienced in creating/presenting presentation decks
Strong written and verbal communication skills
